mapper.select: SELECT CARE_RESERVATION_NAME,CARE_RESERVATION_TYPE,CARE_RESERVATION_ADDRESS FROM TBL_CARE_RESERVATION a,TBL_USER b WHERE a.USER_EMAIL = b.USER_EMAIL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CARE_RESERVATION (CARE_RESERVATION_NUM, CARE_RESERVATION_NAME,CARE_RESERVATION_TYPE ,CARE_RESERVATION_AGE, CARE_RESERVATION_PHONE_NUM, CARE_RESERVATION_GENDER,CARE_RESERVATION_ADD_PHONE_NUM,CARE_RESERVATION_RELATION,CARE_RESERVATION_ADDRESS,CARE_RESERVATION_HOPE_GENDER,CARE_RESERVATION_DATE,CARE_RESERVATION_TIME,CARE_RESERVATION_ADD_REQUIRE,CARE_RESERVATION_PRICE, USER_EMAIL) VALUES (SEQ_RESERVATION.NEXTVAL, #{careReservationName}, #{careReservationType},#{careReservationAge},#{careReservationPhoneNum},#{careReservationGender},#{careReservationAddPhoneNum},#{careReservationRelation},#{careReservationAddress},#{careReservationHopeGender},#{careReservationDate},#{careReservationTime},#{careReservationAddRequire},#{careReservationPrice}, #{userEmail})
